jobInfo.Jobdescription:
We are looking for an experienced Salesforce Developer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for designing and implementing complex Salesforce solutions that meet business requirements and provide a high level of user adoption.

 

Key Responsibilities

 

· The Salesforce Developer candidate would have 3-5 years of experience in implementing and Developing solutions with a focus on CRM/Salesforce.com.

· Develop custom and out of the box solutions using Salesforce functionality (APEX, SOQL, SOSL, Lightning Components, LWC, etc.).

· The Candidate must have excellent Skills and experience in SFDC Configuration/Admin, Apex coding, Lightning Aura component and Lightning Web Components is a big plus.

·The candidate should preferably have experience implementing integration solutions, including integrating SFDC with ETL products like Informatica.

·Experience with CI/CD and deployment techniques in Salesforce.

· Troubleshoot and resolve issues related to Salesforce functionality

· Stay up to date on new Salesforce features and provide recommendations for improvements to the systems.

 

Essential Requirements

 

· Overall, 3+ years of SFDC implementation experience.

· Minimum of 1-year of experience on the Salesforce Lightning Platform.

· Minimum of 1-year experience with Web Application Development including JavaScript, CSS, and HTML.

·Minimum of 1-year experience with Agile – user stories, features, story points, etc.

· Strong knowledge of Salesforce.com design, and development best practices.

· Experience developing in an enterprise environment such as source code control, continuous deployment, release management.

· Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including the ability to work in a team environment.

· SFDC PD1/PD2 or JavaScript Developer I certification is desirable.
jobInfo.Qualification: Bachelor Degree in Computer Science or any relevant degree
